resolvEl

public static java.lang.Object resolvEl(java.lang.String expression)
Method for Resolving any EL and returning the value as an Object. Returns null of no expression is passed.

Parameters:
expression - The El which need to be resolved
Returns:
Object Returns the value which is obtained after resolving the El.

                                            java.lang.StringBuilder sqlStatmnt,
                                            java.lang.Object[] params,
                                            int returnTyp)
Method to Call Function or Procedure for ADF. This Returns only one parameter.

Parameters:
am - ApplicationModuleImpl instance
sqlStatmnt - Sql Statement that need to be executed
params - Parameters that need to be put in the fucntion
returnTyp - Object which is the result
Returns:

isValueForAttributeUnique

public static java.lang.Boolean isValueForAttributeUnique(oracle.jbo.server.ViewObjectImpl vo,
                                                          java.lang.Object val,
                                                          java.lang.StringBuilder attr,
                                                          java.lang.Boolean excludeCurrentRow)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Method to check for Duplicate attribute value in a ViewObject.

Parameters:
vo - viewObject in which duplication needs to checked.
val - value for which duplication needs to be checked.
attr - attribute's name in the vo for which duplication check will run.
excludeCurrentRow - - flag to specify whether you want to consider current row for the check or not. This param was required as sometimes when we are editing the attribute in the current row, and then if we are running duplicate check then it needs to be excluded. If we are editing outside the vo and checking for a value then the check should run on all the rows.
Returns:
Boolean Returns true if the check passed and false when fails
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - This exception is thrown if any passed argument in the method is invalid.
java.lang.Exception

showFacesMessage

public static void showFacesMessage(java.lang.String header,
                                    java.lang.String detail,
                                    javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity,
                                    java.lang.String clientId)
Method to show simple facesMessage with header,detail, severity and if clientId is passed then message will be attached to that client id if available.

Parameters:
header - Header of the FacesMesssage
detail - Detail of the FacesMesssage (Html can be passed in here)
severity - Severity of FacesMessage ex : FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN
clientId - Client id of the component needs to be passed to attach this message to a component. If null then simple message will be thrown.

showFormattedFacesMessage

public static void showFormattedFacesMessage(java.lang.String header,
                                             java.lang.String detail,
                                             javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity)
Method to show simple facesMessage with header,detail, severity and if clientId is passed then message will be attached to that client id if available Message will be formatted in html.

Parameters:
header - Header of the FacesMesssage. (Html should not be passed as formatting is being done in the message)
detail - Detail of the FacesMesssage. (Html should not be passed as formatting is being done in the message)
severity - Severity of FacesMessage ex : FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN
